modName: Nord Mead Brewing - An immersive alcohol mod
summary: AN AMAZING MOD! It adds mead crafting, drinking spells, the ability to make other NPCs drink and MORE!
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]MAJOR UPDATE INCOMING! CELEBRATE![/color]


FEATURED ON GAMESPOT MOD OF THE WEEK!

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SyMenLLG9XE[/youtube]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=SyMenLLG9XE#t=3
[color=red]Mod shown at 8:10.[/color]

Initial release. 1.0.0
Adds a brewery in the West of Whiterun. You can brew mead there, by activating the device on the dwemer table or take or craft the brewing bucket. When dropped on the ground and moved (by holding activate, by default "E") it will bring up a crafting menu. The bucket serves a thirsty Nord on the go!

SPELL!: DRINKBOLT
This spell makes the npc drink, then become drunk, and occasionally vomit or fall over. Has [s]adverse[/s] HILARIOUS effects on animals. WHY ARE YOU GIVING ALCOHOL TO ANIMALS? It can be crafted under MISC at the forge or the tome found in the brewery.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/T6mTaC5.jpg?2[/img]

The brewery ^

Here is a quick video, not made by me, of the spell:

[youtube]ADlnpQZAedo[/youtube]


Another time I might do a detailed video if this gets more popular.

You may use the source of these scripts, it is included. My mod should be compatible with just about everything, except for major changes to Whiterun, which depending on load order will just mean you have to craft items. Do NOT redistribute.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/rYSWzCa.jpg?2[/img]

Heimsker, an example of a drunk who has fallen over.

GREATEST SONG
[youtube]EORI8AfwkFs[/youtube] <--- LISTEN!


RECOMMENDED MODS:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9733/?]AMAZING DRINKING MOD FOR PLAYERS! Mine is NPC-only really[/url]
Is fully compatible, no conflicts. Great mod, lots of fun.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37443/?]DRINKING CONTESTS[/url]

INSTALLATION:
Unzip the files with 7zip and move contents into /data folder. Activate in launcher.

Big thanks to Lordess nexus user for the AMAZING PICTURES and the video.
author: oliver1706
